Abyss Cannon.card_desc: [Broadside] Generate {scale=1|1} Ammo for each enemy hit by Broadside.

Abyss Spike.card_desc: [Harpoon] Harpoon lodges into terrain and explodes when an enemy comes within 20 units, dealing 1000 damage in a 35-unit-radius area.

Blow the Man Down.card_desc: [Harpoon] Enemies hit by Harpoon’s Slow have their Movement Speed reduced by an additional {scale=5|5}%.

Crow's Nest.card_desc: [Broadside] Hitting yourself with Broadside now applies a Knockback of {scale=500|100}.

Cursed Weaponry.card_desc: [Harpoon] Generate {scale=1|1} Ammo for each enemy hit by Harpoon.

Dark Bargain.card_desc: [Shortcut] Heal for {scale=50|50} every 1s while standing near a Shortcut.

Expansive Vault.card_desc: [Shortcut] Jump height is increased for your first jump within {scale=1|1}s after exiting a Shortcut.

Hangman's Ire.card_desc: [Armor] Gain a {scale=150|150}-Health Shield after dropping to or below 50% Health.

Haul on the Bowline.card_desc: [Shortcut] Increase your Movement Speed by {scale=8|8}% for 2s after exiting a Shortcut.

Heave Away.card_desc: [Broadside] Reduce the Cooldown of Harpoon by {scale=0.2|0.2}s for each enemy hit by Broadside.

Hull Piercer.card_desc: [Harpoon] Reduce the Cooldown of Harpoon by {scale=1|1}s.

Hurl.card_desc: [Harpoon] Harpoon no longer has a Cooldown, but no longer Slows enemies hit.

Mortal Skewer.card_desc: [Harpoon] Heal for {scale=80|80} for each enemy hit with Harpoon.

Plank Walker.card_desc: [Shortcut] Heal for {scale=100|100} after exiting a Shortcut.

Reckless Barrage.card_desc: [Broadside] Heal for {scale=50|50} for each enemy hit by Broadside.

Scuttle.card_desc: [Weapon] The projectile launched by reloading your Cursed Howitzer explodes in a 20-unit-radius area on contact.

Sea Dogs.card_desc: [Armor] Increase the Healing you receive by {scale=5|5}% while at or below 50% Health.

Abgrundkanone.card_desc: [Breitseite] Für jeden mit Breitseite getroffenen Gegner wird {scale=1|1} Munition erzeugt.

Abgrundstachel.card_desc: [Harpune] Die Harpune bleibt nun in der Umgebung stecken und explodiert, wenn sich ein Gegner auf 20 Einheiten nähert, in einem Gebiet mit 35-Einheiten-Radius, wobei 1000 Schaden verursacht werden.

Dunkler Handel.card_desc: [Abkürzung] In der Nähe einer Abkürzung wirst du pro Sekunde {scale= 50|50} LP geheilt.

Gro\u00dfe Schatzkammer.card_desc: [Abkürzung] Erhöht die Sprunghöhe deines ersten Sprungs innerhalb von {scale=1|1}s nach Verwendung einer Abkürzung.

Henkerszorn.card_desc: [Rüstung] Fällst du auf oder unter 50% Gesundheit, erhältst du 3s lang einen Schild mit {scale=150|150} LP.

Kr\u00e4hennest.card_desc: [Breitseite] Triffst du dich selbst mit Breitseite, wird ein Rückstoß der Stärke {scale=500|100} ausgelöst.

Leinen los.card_desc: [Breitseite] Für jeden mit Breitseite getroffenen Gegner wird die Abklingzeit von Harpune um {scale=0.2|0.2}s reduziert.

Mann \u00fcber Bord.card_desc: [Harpune] Erhöht die Verlangsamung durch Harpune um weitere {scale=5|5}%.

Rumpfdurchbohrer.card_desc: [Harpune] Reduziert die Abklingzeit von Harpune um {scale=1|1}s.

Schlachtschiff.card_desc: [Rüstung] Erhöht deine maximale Gesundheit um {scale=50|50} LP.

Schleudern.card_desc: [Harpune] Harpune hat keine Abklingzeit, verlangsamt aber nicht mehr.

Seeb\u00e4r.card_desc: [Rüstung] Bei 50% oder weniger Gesundheit erhältst du um {scale=5|5}% erhöhte Heilung.

Seemannsknoten.card_desc: [Abkürzung] Erhöht dein Lauftempo nach Verwendung einer Abkürzung 2s lang um {scale=8|8}%.

Sorgloses Sperrfeuer.card_desc: [Breitseite] Für jeden mit Breitseite getroffenen Gegner wirst du {scale=50|50} LP geheilt.

T\u00f6dlicher Spie\u00df.card_desc: [Harpune] Für jeden mit Harpune getroffenen Gegner wirst du {scale=80|80} LP geheilt.

\u00dcber die Planke.card_desc: [Abkürzung] Nach der Verwendung einer Abkürzung wirst du {scale=100|100} LP geheilt.

Verfluchte Waffen.card_desc: [Harpune] Für jeden mit Harpune getroffenen Gegner wird {scale=1|1} Munition erzeugt.

Versenken.card_desc: [Waffe] Dein beim Nachladen abgefeuertes Projektil explodiert und verursacht in einem 20-Einheiten-Radius Flächenschaden.

Arsenal maudit.card_desc: [Harpon] Vous regagnez {scale=1|1} munition(s) par ennemi atteint avec le Harpon.

Bien aiguis\u00e9.card_desc: [Harpon] Vous regagnez {scale=80|80} PV par ennemi atteint avec Harpon.

Bombardement brutal.card_desc: [Bordée] Vous regagnez {scale=50|50} PV par ennemi atteint avec Bordée.

Bond amplifi\u00e9.card_desc: [Chemin de traverse] Votre premier saut vous propulse plus haut pendant {scale=1|1}s quand vous empruntez un Chemin de traverse.

Br\u00e8che dans la coque.card_desc: [Harpon] Le Harpon se recharge {scale=1|1}s plus vite.

Canon abyssal.card_desc: [Bordée] Vous regagnez {scale=1|1} munition(s) par ennemi atteint avec Bordée.

Courroux du pendu.card_desc: [Armure] Passer en dessous de 50% de PV donne un bouclier de {scale=150|150} PV.

Flot ininterrompu.card_desc: [Harpon] Harpon n'a aucun temps de recharge mais ne ralentit plus les ennemis.

Lance abyssale.card_desc: [Harpon] Harpon se fixe aux parois. Quand un ennemi passe à moins de 20 unités de lui, il explose en infligeant 1000 dégâts dans un rayon de 35 unités.

Loup de mer.card_desc: [Armure] En dessous de 50% de PV, vous recevez {scale=5|5}% de soins en plus.

N\u0152ud de chaise.card_desc: [Chemin de traverse] Votre vitesse augmente de {scale=8|8}% pendant 2s quand vous empruntez un Chemin de traverse.

Oh\u00e9 matelot !.card_desc: [Bordée] Le temps de recharge du Harpon diminue de {scale=0.2|0.2}s par ennemi atteint avec Bordée.

Pacte lugubre.card_desc: [Chemin de traverse] Vous regagnez {scale= 50|50} PV/s à proximité d'un Chemin de traverse.

Ruse de pirate.card_desc: [Harpon] Le ralentissement du Harpon est {scale=5|5}% plus important.

Sabordage.card_desc: [Arme] Le projectile post-rechargement explose à l'impact en infligeant des dégâts dans un rayon de 20 unités.

Supplice de la planche.card_desc: [Chemin de traverse] Vous regagnez {scale=100|100} PV quand vous empruntez un Chemin de traverse.

Vigie.card_desc: [Bordée] Bordée vous applique un recul de {scale=500|100}.

Abyss Cannon.card_desc: [Broadside] Dealing damage with Broadside grants you {scale=1|1} ammo

Abyss Spike.card_desc: [Harpoon] Harpoon now lodges into terrain and explodes for 1000 damage when enemies are nearby.

Blow the Man Down.card_desc: [Harpoon] Increase the strength of Harpoon's Slow by {scale=5|5}%

Dark Bargain.card_desc: [Short Cut] Standing near a Short Cut Heals you for {scale= 50|50} health every 1s

Expansive Vault.card_desc: [Short Cut] Your first jump within {scale=1|1}s of exiting Short Cut will be higher.

Hangman's Ire.card_desc: [Armor] Dropping below 50% HP grants a {scale=150|150}hp Shield for 3s

Haul on the Bowline.card_desc: [Short Cut] Gain {scale=8|8}% movement speed for 2s after exiting a Short Cut

Heave Away.card_desc: [Broadside] Broadside increases your reload speed by {scale=8|8}% for 5s

Hurl.card_desc: [Harpoon] Harpoon has no cooldown and no longer slows enemies.

Mortal Skewer.card_desc: [Harpoon] Heal for {scale=80|80} life when dealing damage with Harpoon

Plank Walker.card_desc: [Short Cut] Heal for {scale=100|100} Health when traveling through a Short Cut.

Reckless Barrage.card_desc: [Broadside] Dealing damage with Broadside heals you for {scale=50|50} health

Scuttle.card_desc: [Weapon] Your reload projectile now explodes in an area of effect

Sea Dogs.card_desc: [Armor] While below 50% Health receive {scale=5|5}% increased healing.

Spy Glass.card_desc: [Broadside] Enemies Within {scale=10|10}ft of Broadsides projectiles are revealed.

Acorazado.card_desc: [Armadura] Tu salud máxima aumenta en {scale=50|50} PS.

Alejar.card_desc: [Cañón] Se reduce la recarga de Arpón en {scale=0.2|0.2}s por cada enemigo alcanzado con Cañón.

Aluvi\u00f3n temerario.card_desc: [Cañón] Te curas {scale=50|50} PS por cada enemigo que alcanzas con Cañón.

Arrojar.card_desc: [Arpón] Arpón ya tiene recarga, pero tampoco ralentiza a los enemigos.

Arsenal maldita.card_desc: [Arpón] Recuperas {scale=1|1} de munición por cada enemigo que alcanzas con Arpón.

B\u00f3veda expansiva.card_desc: [Atajo] La altura de tu primer salto en {scale=1|1}s tras salir de un Atajo aumenta.

Ca\u00f1\u00f3n abisal.card_desc: [Cañón] Recuperas {scale=1|1} de munición por cada enemigo que alcanzas con Cañón.

Captura la bolina.card_desc: [Atajo] Tu velocidad de movimiento aumenta un {scale=8|8}% durante 2s tras salir de un Atajo.

Condenado.card_desc: [Atajo] Te curas {scale=100|100} PS tras salir de un Atajo.

Escabullir.card_desc: [Arma] El proyectil que se lanza al recargar Obús maldecido explota en un área de 20 unidades de radio al impactar.

Ira del ejecutor.card_desc: [Armadura] Consigues un escudo con {scale=150|150} PS cuando tu salud baja al 50% o menos.

Navajada mortal.card_desc: [Arpón] Te curas {scale=80|80} PS por cada enemigo que alcanzas con Arpón.

Nido de cuervo.card_desc: [Cañón] Si te afecta Cañón, ahora te repeles {scale=500|100} unidades.

Pacto sombr\u00edo.card_desc: [Atajo] Te curas {scale= 50|50} PS cada 1s mientras estés cerca de un Atajo.

Perforacascos.card_desc: [Arpón] Se reduce la recarga de Arpón en {scale=1|1}s.

Perros del mar.card_desc: [Armadura] La curación recibida aumenta un {scale=5|5}% si tienes un 50% o menos de salud.

Pico del abismo.card_desc: [Arpón] Arpón se clava en el terreno y explota cuando un enemigo se acerca a 20 unidades o menos, infligiendo 1000 PS de daño en un área de 35 unidades.

T\u00fambalo.card_desc: [Arpón] Se reduce la velocidad de movimiento de los enemigos afectados por la ralentización de Arpón un {scale=5|5}% más.

Agarrado na Bolina.card_desc: [Atalho] Aumenta em {scale=8|8}% a velocidade de movimento por 2s depois de sair do Atalho.

Andando na Prancha.card_desc: [Atalho] Você se cura em {scale=100|100} de vida após sair do Atalho.

Arremesso.card_desc: [Arpão] Arpão não tem mais intervalo, mas não atordoa os inimigos atingidos.

Ataque Incessante.card_desc: [Artilharia] Você se cura em {scale=50|50} de vida para cada inimigo atingido pela Artilharia.

Barganha Sombria.card_desc: [Atalho] Você se cura em {scale= 50|50} de vida a cada 1s enquanto ficar próximo do Atalho.

Canh\u00e3o Abissal.card_desc: [Artilharia] Gera {scale=1|1} de munição a cada inimigo atingido pela Artilharia.

Encoura\u00e7ado.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta a sua vida máxima em {scale=50|50}.

Espeto Mortal.card_desc: [Arpão] Você se cura em {scale=80|80} de vida para cada inimigo atingido pelo Arpão.

F\u00faria do Enforcado.card_desc: [Armadura] Ganha um escudo de {scale=150|150} de vida ao chegar a 50% ou menos da sua vida.

Homem ao Mar.card_desc: [Arpão] Inimigos afetados pela lentidão do Arpão têm a velocidade de movimento reduzido em {scale=5|5}% a mais.

Lan\u00e7a Abissal.card_desc: [Arpão] O Arpão se finca no terreno e explode quando um inimigo chega a 20 unidades de distância, causando 1000 de dano em uma área de 35 unidades de raio.

Levantando o Moral.card_desc: [Artilharia] Reduz o intervalo do Arpão em {scale=0.2|0.2}s para cada inimigo atingido pela Artilharia.

Matilha do Mar.card_desc: [Armadura] Aumenta em {scale=5|5}% a cura que você recebe enquanto estiver com 50% ou menos de vida.

Muni\u00e7\u00e3o Amaldi\u00e7oada.card_desc: [Arpão] Gera {scale=1|1} de munição a cada inimigo atingido pelo Arpão.

Naufr\u00e1gio.card_desc: [Arma] O projétil disparado ao recarregar seu Morteiro Amaldiçoado explode em uma área de 20 unidades de raio ao contato.

Ninho de Corvos.card_desc: [Artilharia] Atingir-se com a Artilharia aplica em você uma repulsão de {scale=500|100}.

Perfurador.card_desc: [Arpão] Reduz o intervalo do Arpão em {scale=1|1}s.

Salto Amplo.card_desc: [Atalho] Aumenta a altura do primeiro salto dado dentro de {scale=1|1}s após sair do Atalho.

\u0412\u043e\u0440\u043e\u043d\u044c\u04.card_desc: [Бортовой залп] Попадание Бортовым залпом по себе отбрасывает вас на {scale=500|100} ед.

\u0413\u043d\u0435\u0432 \u0432\u0438\u0.card_desc: [Броня] При уровне здоровья 50% и ниже вы получаете щит прочностью {scale=150|150} ед.

\u0414\u0440\u0435\u0434\u043d\u043e\u04.card_desc: [Броня] Ваше максимальное здоровье повышается на {scale=50|50} ед.

\u041a\u0430\u0447\u043a\u0430.card_desc: [Бортовой залп] Каждое попадание по врагу Бортовым залпом сокращает перезарядку Гарпуна на {scale=0.2|0.2} с.

\u041c\u0435\u0442\u0430\u043d\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Гарпун] У Гарпуна больше нет перезарядки, и он не замедляет врагов.

\u041c\u043e\u0440\u0441\u043a\u043e\u04.card_desc: [Броня] При уровне здоровья 50% и ниже вы получаете на {scale=5|5}% больше исцеления.
[Бортовой залп] Каждое попадание по врагу Бортовым залпом исцеляет вас на {scale=50|50} ед.

\u041e\u0433\u0440\u043e\u043c\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Короткий путь] В течение {scale=1|1} с. после выхода с Короткого пути ваш первый прыжок окажется выше.

\u041f\u0430\u043b\u0443\u0431\u043d\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Ваш максимальный боезапас повышается на {scale=1|1} ед.

\u041f\u0438\u0440\u0430\u0442\u0441\u04.card_desc: [Гарпун] Скорость передвижения врагов, замедленных Гарпуном, снижается еще на {scale=5|5}%.

\u041f\u0440\u043e\u0431\u043e\u0438\u04.card_desc: [Оружие] Снаряд, выпущенный перезарядкой Проклятой гаубицы, при попадании взрывается в радиусе 20 ед.

\u041f\u0440\u043e\u0433\u0443\u043b\u04.card_desc: [Короткий путь] После выхода с Короткого пути вы исцеляетесь на {scale=100|100} ед.

\u041f\u0440\u043e\u043a\u043b\u044f\u04.card_desc: [Гарпун] Каждое попадание по врагу Гарпуном генерирует {scale=1|1} ед. боеприпасов.

\u041f\u0443\u0448\u043a\u0430 \u0411\u0.card_desc: [Бортовой залп] Каждое попадание по врагу Бортовым залпом генерирует {scale=1|1} ед. боеприпасов.

\u0422\u0430\u0440\u0430\u043d.card_desc: [Гарпун] За каждого врага, пораженного Гарпуном, вы исцеляетесь на {scale=80|80} ед.

\u0422\u0435\u043c\u043d\u0430\u044f \u0.card_desc: [Короткий путь] Стоя рядом с Коротким путем, вы исцеляетесь на {scale= 50|50} ед. в секунду.

\u0428\u0430\u043d\u0442\u0438.card_desc: [Короткий путь] При выходе с Короткого пути ваша скорость передвижения повышается на {scale=8|8}% на 2 с.

\u0428\u043f\u0438\u043b\u044c \u0411\u0.card_desc: [Гарпун] Гарпун вонзается в землю и взрывается, когда в радиусе 20 ед. от него оказываются враги, нанося 1000 ед. урона в радиусе 35 ед.

Cuma dziobowa.card_desc: [Skrót] Zwiększa szybkość ruchu o {scale=8|8}% na 2 s po wyjściu ze Skrótu.

Drednot.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zwiększa twoje maks. zdrowie o {scale=50|50} PZ.

Dzia\u0142o Otch\u0142ani.card_desc: [Burta] Każde trafienie wroga Burtą wytwarza {scale=1|1} szt. amunicji.

Dziesi\u0119\u0107 w skali Beauforta.card_desc: [Burta] Każde trafienie wroga Burtą skraca czas odnowienia Harpuna o {scale=0.2|0.2} s.

Ech do czorta!.card_desc: [Burta] Każde trafienie wroga Burtą przywraca ci {scale=50|50} PZ.

Kolec Otch\u0142ani.card_desc: [Harpun] Harpun utyka w ziemi i eksploduje, kiedy wróg znajdzie się w odległości 20 jedn., zadając 1000 obrażeń na obszarze o promieniu 35 jedn.

Mroczny pakt.card_desc: [Skrót] Stanie w pobliżu Skrótu przywraca ci {scale= 50|50} PZ co 1 s.

Przebijacz kad\u0142ub\u00f3w.card_desc: [Harpun] Skraca czas odnowienia Harpuna o {scale=1|1} s.

Przej\u015bcie po desce.card_desc: [Skrót] Przywraca ci {scale=100|100} PZ po wyjściu ze Skrótu.

Przekl\u0119ta bro\u0144.card_desc: [Harpun] Każde trafienie wroga Harpunem wytwarza {scale=1|1} szt. amunicji.

Rzut.card_desc: [Harpun] Harpun nie ma czasu odnowienia, ale nie spowalnia już trafionych wrogów.

Samozatopienie.card_desc: [Broń] Pocisk wystrzelony przez przeładowanie Przeklętej haubicy, wybuchając przy zderzeniu, razi obszar o promieniu 20 jedn.

\u015amia\u0142y harpunnik.card_desc: [Harpun] Szybkość ruchu wrogów trafionych spowolnieniem Harpuna zostaje zmniejszona o dodatkowe {scale=5|5}%.

\u015amiertelna szpada.card_desc: [Harpun] Każde trafienie wroga Harpunem przywraca ci {scale=80|80} PZ.

Wielki skarbiec.card_desc: [Skrót] Zwiększa wysokość pierwszego skoku na {scale=1|1} s po wyjściu ze Skrótu.

Wilki morskie.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zwiększa otrzymywane przez ciebie leczenie o {scale=5|5}%, jak długo twój poziom zdrowia nie przekracza 50%.

Wisielczy humor.card_desc: [Pancerz] Zapewnia tarczę o {scale=150|150} pkt. odporności, jak długo twój poziom zdrowia nie przekracza 50%.

Wronie gniazdo.card_desc: [Burta] Trafienie samego siebie Burtą zapewnia odrzucenie o {scale=500|100} jedn.

B\u00fcy\u00fck Kasa.card_desc: [Kestirme] Kestirme'den çıktıktan sonraki {scale=1|1} saniyede zıplama yüksekliğin artar.

Cehennem Dikeni.card_desc: [Zıpkın] Zıpkın yere saplanır ve 20 birim yakınına bir düşman geldiğinde patlayarak 35 birimlik bir alanda 1000 hasar verir.

Cehennem Topu.card_desc: [Alabanda] Alabanda ile vurduğun her düşman için {scale=1|1} Cephane oluştur.

\u00c7ek \u00c7ek Kay\u0131k\u00e7\u0131.card_desc: [Zıpkın] Zıpkın'ın Yavaşlatması ile vurulan düşmanların Hareket Hızı ek %{scale=5|5} daha azalır.

Cellad\u0131n Hiddeti.card_desc: [Zırh] Canın %50 ya da altına düşerse {scale=150|150} Canlık bir Kalkan kazanırsın.

Deniz K\u00f6pekleri.card_desc: [Zırh] %50 Can veya altındayken aldığın İyileştirmeyi %{scale=5|5} artır.

Esrarl\u0131 Pazarl\u0131k.card_desc: [Kestirme] Bir Kestirme'nin yanında dururken her 1 saniyede {scale=50|50} Can İyileş.

Halatlar\u0131 \u00c7ek.card_desc: [Kestirme] Kestirme'den çıktıktan sonra Hareket Hızını 2sn boyunca %{scale=8|8} artır.

Karga Yuvas\u0131.card_desc: [Alabanda] Alabanda ile kendini vurduğunda {scale=500|100} birimlik Geri İtme uygularsın.

Melun Silah.card_desc: [Zıpkın] Zıpkın ile vurduğun her düşman için {scale=1|1} Cephane oluştur.

\u00d6l\u00fcmc\u00fcl \u015ei\u015f.card_desc: [Zıpkın] Zıpkın ile vurduğun her düşman için {scale=80|80} Can iyileş.

Pervas\u0131z Yayl\u0131m.card_desc: [Alabanda] Alabanda ile vurduğun her düşman için {scale=50|50} Can İyileş.

Savur.card_desc: [Zıpkın] Zıpkın'ın bekleme süresi yoktur ve vurduğu düşmanları Yavaşlatmaz.

S\u0131v\u0131\u015f.card_desc: [Silah] Lanetli Havan Topu'nu doldururken atılan mermi temas anında 20 birimlik bir etki alanında patlar.

Vira.card_desc: [Alabanda] Alabanda ile vurduğun her düşman için Zıpkın'ın Bekleme Süresini {scale=0.2|0.2}sn azalt.
